text: 15:14 Aisaia 9:16; Malakai 2:8; Matyu 23:16; Luk 6:39; Rom 2:19Ia gumazir kabagh nɨghnɨghan markɨ. Me damazir okavɨrɨziba, egha me tuavim isava gumazir igharazimɨn akakasi. Eghtɨ gumazir damazir okavɨrɨzim tuavim isava gumazir okavɨrɨzir mamɨn akakagh, egh aning vɨrara mangɨ mozimɨn magɨrɨgham.”
